metadata.title: CVE-2017-9227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Oniguruma 6.2.0, as used in Oniguruma-mod inRuby through 2.4.1 and mbstring in PHP through 7.1.5. A stack out-of-boundsread occurs in mbc_enc_len() during regular expression searching. Invalidhandling of reg->dmin in forward_search_range() could result in an invalidpointer dereference, as an out-of-bounds read from a stack buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libonig2 - 5.9.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

criterions.comment: libonig package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.9.6-1ubuntu0.1').
php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.22-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
